title: Forgiveness and Atonement
description: Eva is nursing a broken heart and to top it all off she’s pregnant. Against her better judgement, she fell for a man when she knew their relationship was only supposed to be temporary. But when she tries to contact Jason to tell him their relationship is about to get a lot more permanent; she finds out that he isn’t who he claimed to be.Mason is back in Seattle and Jason Bourke is nothing but a distant memory. Too bad he can’t seem to get Eva out of his head. But instead of running back to Eva, he is engaged to Aletta and is about one drink away from spiraling out of control.Will Eva and Mason ever lay eyes on one another again? And if they do, will Eva ever be able to forgive him for lying to her?Forgiveness and Atonement is the second instalment in the For Keeps series. Due to its explicit content, bad language and graphic sexual content, Forgiveness and Atonement is recommended for mature readers of eighteen years and above.This book ends on a cliffhanger.
author: Alexa  Kane
